Articles.Content:
I am unable to get KSP to run. I was having issues where the game would start to launch and at the very end right before it would launch it would come up with an error message saying the game had crashed. I thought it might be from running an old version of windows 8, so i updated to windows 10 last night, but i still had the same problem (and i have attached the crash logs from that attempt) however i just tried opening the game again to screenshot the error message and it just goes into a black screen with the fps showing in the corner and seems to want to sit there forever. any help would be greatly appreciated

crash logs

3 hours ago, downclimb4what said:

I am unable to get KSP to run. I was having issues where the game would start to launch and at the very end right before it would launch it would come up with an error message saying the game had crashed. I thought it might be from running an old version of windows 8, so i updated to windows 10 last night, but i still had the same problem (and i have attached the crash logs from that attempt) however i just tried opening the game again to screenshot the error message and it just goes into a black screen with the fps showing in the corner and seems to want to sit there forever. any help would be greatly appreciated

crash logs

Try reinstalling the game, and make sure you don't have any old or outdated mods.

9 hours ago, downclimb4what said:

crash logs 

Mod DLLs found:
Stock assembly: Assembly-CSharp v0.0.0.0
ModuleManager.2.7.5 v2.7.5.0
KAS v0.6.2.0 / v0.6.2 for KSP 1.2
MiniAVC v1.0.3.1
KerbalEngineer v1.1.2.8
KerbalEngineer.Unity v1.0.0.0
MiniAVC v1.0.3.2
MechJeb2 v2.5.1.0 / v / v2.6.0.0
DockingPortAlignmentIndicator v1.0.0.0
DPAI_RPM v1.0.0.0
MiniAVC v1.0.3.2
ModuleDockingNodeNamed v1.0.0.0

There's your problem: old mods from 1.2.2.

Edited June 21, 2018 by Harry Rhodan
